Articles.Content: I've always felt kerbin from the night side is pretty bland. I know AVP has city lights, but there's frankly not enough for my taste. Would anybody know of visual mods for the stock system that add in more substantial city lights and or city textures on kerbin's surface?

You could modify the citylights cfg file of the various graphics packages to point to different textures of your choosing or making. The internet has a lot city texture maps that could be converted and used. just ensure the file size is similar to the existing size. 512 x 512  file format DDS.

You could also carry on with Kerbal Cities Pack, which ambitiously tried to develop a system of procedural cities for Kerbin using Kerbal Konstructs. The procedural part isn't there, but all the city building block pieces are.
